name: wtr-lab-novel-reviewer
description: Analyzes novels on wtr-lab.com using Gemini AI to provide comprehensive assessments including character development, plot structure, world-building, themes & messages, and writing style.
author: MasuRii

scripts.build: npm run format && npm run lint:fix && npm run version:update && webpack --mode=production
scripts.build:performance: npm run format && npm run lint:fix && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production
scripts.build:greasyfork: npm run format && npm run lint:fix && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production
scripts.build:devbundle: npm run format && npm run lint:fix && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:check: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:css:fix
